title: How does Akali beat Nasus?
body:
Every other Akali player I talk to is like "pffft Nasus is easy are you kidding?"

I can never beat the dog.. He just plays safe, and rushes spectres cowl.. eventually out scaling me. What am I doing wrong in this matchup? I don't get it.

(BTW Spectres cowl is cool, I love giving my opponent health) Like Q all day? Barely loses health Q>Proc? Take minion damage, he goes back to full.. egh
